text: Francis Ralph Quilici (May 11, 1939 â€“ May 14, 2018) was a former Major League infielder and manager. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He had a five-year playing career and a four-year managerial career. He played for the Minnesota Twins of the American League in 1965, then 1967-1970. Quilici died on May 14, 2018 in Minneapolis, Minnesota at the age of 79.Frank Quilici, former Twins player, manager and broadcaster, passes away at 79 ESPN Radio, May 14, 2018 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Frank Quilici
